subject: fix(pwa): prevent setInterval leak in usePWAUpdate hook
body:
The original code called setInterval directly inside the onRegistered
callback. Since onRegistered fires on every component mount, this
leaked intervals on remounts (React Strict Mode, hot reload, etc.)
with no cleanup path.

Move interval management into a useEffect with a cleanup function
that calls clearInterval on unmount. The SW registration is stored
in a ref and a boolean state flag triggers the effect.
